channel.title: Getting Started on flowcontrol
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on flowcontrol

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Parts List Here’s a list of parts you’ll need if you’d like to build the hardware yourself: USB to UART module Raspberry Pi Pico x2 4-Pin PWM Fan Connector Male x2 10k Resistors x2 Female and Male JST Connectors (For temp sensors, optional) If you can solder SMD, there’s a PCB available. These may be available pre-soldered in the future.
